title: There's only so much copy you set in Neuropolâ€¦
content:

and I think this too much.
author: Richard Hards

comments.content: The bullets kinda read like zeros. lol
Oh how I wish that that font was never created. Seriously some of the ugliest forms ever produced. And everyone seems to use it. Argh.
what exactly is modern food? this makes me embarrassed to be british.
Personally, I find "a modern contemporary retro style look" sends rather confused message too.
And who wants to hang out in the zero function room. The mind comes to a complete halt.
